explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a black and yellow T-shirt, with a transparent glove on one hand and a tool in the other, is standing in front of a fruit stall. There are various fresh fruits and a metal tool on the stall, and a black car in the background.

[0-6] The man is wearing a black mask, and there is a white car on the right side. Then he takes a green guava from the left side and holds it in his hand, using a fruit knife in the other hand to evenly cut the guava into the metal tool. After cutting one, he throws the core under the stall.
